text: Tadeusz Kalinowski (1 June 1915 - 22 August 1969) was a Polish actor. He appeared in thirty films and television shows between 1954 and 1979. ==Selected filmography== * How to Be Loved (1963) * Pięciu (1964) * Czterej Pancerni i Pies (1966) * Everything for Sale (1969) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:People from Leibnitz
title: Tadeusz Kalinowski
